summary: A 2048x2048 retexture of the MALE archmage robes. Replaces the fur with black feathers for a more mystic/gothic feel.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#0099FF][size=24][b]Raven Archmage - by Flobulon[/b][/size][/color][/center]

A HD reskin of the Archmage robes, with raven feathers instead of fur to give a more mystic feel. Please see the comparison pics.
Normal maps have been remastered to provide greater detail. 
All textures are double the vanilla resolution - please contact me if your computer cannot handle these resolutions and I will provide alternative files at the original resolutions. Enjoy!

[b]These robes are currently available for MALE ONLY.[/b]

If I have time, and there is enough demand for it, I may create a female version (I do not play a female).

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Installation[/b][/color][/size]
Copy the \"Data\" folder into your Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim folder. Say yes to any prompts about merging folders.

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Uninstallation[/b][/color][/size]
Delete the following files from your Data folder:

	- textures\\clothes\\archmage\\m\\robes.dds
	- textures\\clothes\\archmage\\m\\robes_n.dds
	- textures\\clothes\\archmage\\m\\hood.dds
	- textures\\clothes\\archmage\\m\\hood_n.dds

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b] Version History[/b][/color][/size]

23/12/11 - 1.0 - First release
24/12/11 - 1.1 - Added matching hood texture

[size=3][color=#0099FF][b]Contact[/b][/color][/size]
Contact the creator of this mod, Flobulon, on www.skyrimnexus.com or www.thenexusforums.com or through the comments page of this mod.
author: Flobulon
